rules.text: If someone is harassing you, report it to a moderator.
Don't post anything that's illegal in the US. We are hosted there.
Mark NSFW content as such using Content Warnings.
You must read and accept the code of conduct - https://toot.pizza/about
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Don't join just to advertise something
